body.name: Dream On Me JPMA & Greenguard Gold Certified Milton 5-in-1 Convertible Crib Made with Sustainable New Zealand Pinewood in White, Non-Toxic Finish

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 22 mins
features: 5 IN 1 CONVERTIBILITY: Modern and long-lasting, this crib effortlessly converts from a standard-size crib to a toddler bed, daybed & full-size bed (conversion kit sold separately).
UTMOST SAFETY: Not only is the crib JPMA & Greenguard Gold certified, but it also meets/exceeds the ASTM & CPSC standards, providing utmost safety for your baby.
SOLID & STURDY: The Milton 5-in-1 Convertible Crib is built of sustainable New Zealand Pinewood and sturdy wooden spindles, with a child-safe, non-toxic finish.
THOUGHTFULLY & CONVENIENT: This convenient crib is easy to spot or wipe clean and comes in 3 alluring finishes that complement your nursery - White & Natural, Pebble Grey and White.
PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: Product dimensions are 54.5” L x 29.5” W x 48” H, with a weight of 55 Lbs.
body.description: A crib that’s meant for every special stage in your child’s life! Introducing the Milton 5 in 1 Convertible Crib - where ultra-modern aesthetic meets wholesome classic design. Crafted to be your little one’s companion for life, this crib seamlessly converts to a toddler bed, day bed & full-size bed (conversion kit sold separately). Not only is the crib JPMA & Greenguard Gold certified, but it also meets/exceeds the ASTM & CPSC standards, providing utmost safety for your baby. The Milton 5-in-1 Convertible Crib is built of sustainable New Zealand Pinewood and sturdy wooden spindles, with a child-safe, non-toxic finish. What’s more, this convenient crib is easy to spot or wipe clean and comes in 3 alluring finishes that complement your nursery - White & Natural, Pebble Grey and White. Product dimensions are 54.5” L X 29.5” W X 48” H, with a weight of 55 Lbs.

A full-size playard, the Nest is spacious, safe and loaded with convenient features. The Dream On Me Classic Design Toddler Bed is ideal for toddlers as they make the transition from a crib to a bed. The crib guard rail is designed to fit your toddler's bed perfectly, ensuring their safety during sleep. The convertible full size bed rail accommodates growing children and asily attachable to a full size crib Certifications Greenguard Gold & JPMA Certified Meets/exceeds all the safety standards set by ASTM & CPSC Greenguard Gold, JPMA certified & meets and exceeds the CPSC & ASTM standards Meets/exceeds all the safety standards set by ASTM & CPSC Meets/exceeds all the safety standards set by ASTM & CPSC

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is such a nice crib. Very sturdy and easy to assemble. I would 100% buy it again. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and versatile!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to keep in our spare room for my new nephew, who I'm going to start watching a couple days a week. The pebble grey color goes nicely with our nautical decor. While I'll only be using this as a crib for now, I love that it's so versatile and can convert to various-staged beds. I found it relatively easy to assemble. The instructions were easy to follow and I didn't really run into any issues, although there were a couple times having another person would've been handy. It only comes with parts for the crib, so you do have to purchase a conversion kit if/when upgrading into a bed. Either way, I still find this to be a great value. It looks and feels solid and sturdy. My sister came down after I finally finished assembling it (I started & stopped a few times), and she absolutely loves it. In fact, she likes it better than the more expensive one she'd purchased for his nursery. I can't wait to get the mattress pad in and finish decorating. I'll update this if I come across any issues, but I'm really happy with it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality but has a minor flaw
reviews.reviewText: When I first unpacked this, there was an odor, but it disappeared a couple of days later. I put the crib together by myself; however, there are a couple of screws, making it very difficult to work with. These screws are too close to the edges, and the Alen key doesn't fit. So, you need to rotate the screw a little, remove the tool, and put it back in. They could move these holes less than an inch, which would have been perfect. So, this is just a design flaw, and it doesn't change the fact that the product quality is good.Based on my experience, I can recommend it, but there is a minor inconvenience when assembling the crib.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and sustainable materials
reviews.reviewText: We bought the Dream on Me Milton 5-in-1 convertible crib because of its versatility as well as its use of sustainable materials like the New Zealand Wood and water based paint. The crib seems to be very well made and designed. Assembly was very easy and can be done by just one person. However, it did take a bit of time. One thing to note as it probably is a bit confusing to many is that this product only contains the parts for an infant crib. If you want to convert the crib into a toddler or youth bed, you need to purchase a separate conversion kit which you can buy on the manufacturers website. The white paint of the crib really looks nice and the classic and elegant design of the headboard really make it stand out. It has a standard crib size, so any standard crib mattress will fit, but also needs to be purchased separately. Overall, this is a great quality, sustainable, and versatile convertible crib that will last a long time. At over $300 at the time of this review it is a pretty good value considering the quality and sustainability of the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It has spots
reviews.reviewText: I’m due in February got this crib last week, it was easy to put it together it’s not very sturdy and it has dark spots everywhere just a bad paint job but it’s hassle to take it apart and return so we’re keeping it but I’m not happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Came with damage to the railing
reviews.reviewText: Damaged railing, very disappointing as it was hard enough to get in the house forget about reboxing and putting in my car while 26 weeks pregnant to return to ups

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am really pleased with the look and quality of this crib! It was packaged very well, and arrived without any dents, knicks or chips. The paint is like a semi-gloss and is smooth to the touch and very easy to wipe clean.While the individual parts are not very heavy, it is cumbersome to put together by yourself. Thankfully, there were two of us and that made the job much easier. All parts and hardware pieces are labeled, and the instructions are clear. The only tool required for assembly is an Allen wrench / hex key which is included with the hardware pack. It’s also good to have a flat head screwdriver on hand in case you need to secure the barrel nuts while tightening. From unpacking to final display, it took us about an hour.Should you want to see the instructions prior to purchasing, the company’s website has them available for download on the product page.Overall, I highly recommend this crib. The price point is fair, the neutral color is great, and since it’s convertible, it can be adapted as your child grows. I am really pleased with this crib and the fact that the little one will be able to use it for many years to come!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and beautifully made
reviews.reviewText: The Dream On Me Milton 5-in-1 Convertible Crib is an excellent investment for parents looking for a long-lasting and versatile piece of furniture that can grow with their child. The crib is made with sustainable New Zealand pinewood, which is both durable and eco-friendly. The pebble grey finish gives the crib a modern and stylish look that will complement any nursery decor.One of the standout features of this crib is its 5-in-1 functionality. It can be converted from a standard crib to a toddler bed, daybed, and even a full-size bed with the purchase of additional conversion kits. This means that the crib can be used from infancy through the teenage years, making it an excellent value for the price.Parents will appreciate the safety features of this crib. It is JPMA and Greenguard Gold certified, ensuring that it meets the highest safety standards for children. The non-toxic finish is also a plus, as it ensures that the crib won't off-gas harmful chemicals into the air.Assembly of the crib is straightforward, thanks to the included tools and easy-to-follow instructions. The mattress height can be adjusted to three different positions, depending on the age and size of your baby. This ensures that your baby is always safe and secure in the crib.Overall, the Dream On Me Milton 5-in-1 Convertible Crib is an excellent investment for parents looking for a versatile and safe crib that will last for years. The sustainable materials and non-toxic finish make it an eco-friendly choice, while the 5-in-1 functionality and safety features ensure that your child will be comfortable and secure throughout their childhood.
